find_package(Eigen3 REQUIRED)
# Add as "system headers" to avoid warnings generated by them with
# compilers that support that notion.
include_directories(SYSTEM ${EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIR})

find_package(Qt4 COMPONENTS QtCore QtGui QtOpenGL REQUIRED)
include_directories(SYSTEM ${QT_INCLUDES})
add_definitions(${QT_DEFINITIONS})

set(HEADERS
  elementtranslator.h
  extensionplugin.h
  periodictableview.h
  pluginmanager.h
  sceneplugin.h
  scenepluginmodel.h
)

set(SOURCES
  elementdetail_p.cpp
  elementitem_p.cpp
  elementtranslator.cpp
  extensionplugin.cpp
  periodictablescene_p.cpp
  periodictableview.cpp
  pluginmanager.cpp
  sceneplugin.cpp
  scenepluginmodel.cpp
)

avogadro_add_library(AvogadroQtGui ${HEADERS} ${SOURCES})
target_link_libraries(AvogadroQtGui
  AvogadroCore
  AvogadroRendering
  ${QT_QTCORE_LIBRARY}
  ${QT_QTGUI_LIBRARY})
